name: 功能请求 | Feature Request
about: 为这个项目提出一个想法 | Suggest an idea for this project
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## 功能描述 | Feature Description

清晰简洁地描述你想要的功能。
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## 问题背景 | Problem Context

描述你遇到的问题或需求。
Describe the problem or need you're trying to address.

例如：当我分析大型项目时，等待时间太长...
Example: When I analyze large projects, the waiting time is too long...

## 解决方案 | Proposed Solution

描述你期望的解决方案。
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## 备选方案 | Alternative Solutions

描述你考虑过的任何替代解决方案或功能。
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## 使用场景 | Use Cases

描述这个功能的使用场景。
Describe the use cases for this feature.

- 场景 1: ...
- 场景 2: ...

## 额外信息 | Additional Context

添加关于功能请求的任何其他上下文或截图。
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

## 实现建议 | Implementation Suggestions (可选 | Optional)

如果你有关于如何实现这个功能的想法，请在这里描述。
If you have ideas about how to implement this feature, please describe them here.
